docs.lead_paragraph: Twelve years ago there was no more population sure of Whig policy than the distribution of the proceeds of the public lands among the States. It was submerged in the deluge of Tyler's treachery, and its consequent disasters-Polk's election, the Mexican war, and be slavery issues. But daily experience is demonstrating that it was a wise and necessary doctrine of party faith.

headline.main: WASHINGTON.; Proceeds of the Public Lands--The Assignability of Land Warrants--The California Census--Apportionment of Representation. Matters at Washington, Political and Personal-Ice Bridge over the Susquehanna, &c.

docs.abstract: Chosen Senator from California in place of J C Fremont
docs.lead_paragraph: The steamship Prometheus, Capt. H. CHURCHILL, arrived at her wharf Saturday morning, from San Juan, with 226 passengers, $32,000 gold dust on freight, and $40,000 in the hands of the passengers. The steamer North America, left San Francisco on the 2d inst., bringing to San Juan del Sur, the passengers arrived in the Prometheus. The U. S.

headline.main: ELEVEN DAYS; ARRIVAL OF THE PROMETHEUS. $72,000 in Gold Dust. THROUGH IN TWENTY-SIX DAYS. JOHN B. WELLER ELECTED TO THE U. S. SENATE I Senatorial Election. MISCELLANEOUS. Mining Intelligence MARRIED. DIED.

docs.lead_paragraph: We made a few remarks the other day upon the tortures employed in our State Penitentiaries, but were unable to lay hands on the Report of the Legislative Committee respecting the general management of those places. Upon turning to that document we find ample evidence of the inhumanities in habitual practice. The visitors say, over cautiously we think, in view of the testimony they elicited:
